name: Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Infamy
name_original: Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Infamy
description:
Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Infamy is an action game developed by Ubisoft Quebec. It was originally released in 2013. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Infamy has a Metascore of 74, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Infamy is available on Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC. You can purchase the game on Steam.
